content: hello everyone to kick off february i m bringing you the second installment in my year of the rabbit monthly bunny pattern project love bunnies that s right with valentine s day around the corner i decided to make a bunny couple and since i needed one pair for our little shrine and one pair for the february door wreath i made two i hope you will like them and make your own bunfriends materials to make the love bunnies you will need a crochet hook 2 5mm yarns in your color of choice for the bunnies if you want to make a carrot you will also need some orange and green a tapestry needle and scissors stuffing safety eyes i used 6mm a stitch marker to help you keep track of the start of the round please note that you can make the love bunnies using any size crochet hook and yarn weight for a smaller or bigger result using dk yarn and a 2 5mm crochet hook the love bunnies should be about 10-15cm tall depending on the ears stitches & abbreviations the pattern is written using us crochet terms in continuous spirals you will need to know the following kinds of stitches to make him magic_ring magic_ring chaning chain single_crochet single_crochet half double crochets half_double_crochet double crochets double_crochet or triple crochets tc if making a flower depending on size decrease decrease preferably using the invisible decrease method increase increase if you like what i m doing please consider following me over at twitter @rinamogrynaart and/or supporting me on ko-fi @rinamogryna <3
